org.jerkar.tool
Class JkBuildPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.tool.JkBuildPlugin
Direct Known Subclasses:
JkJavaBuildPlugin
public abstract class JkBuildPlugin
extends java.lang.Object

A plugin base class to extend to alter JkBuild object.
